title: GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DEFENSE_MODIFIER_2
content:
0x986B65FF// GetPlayerWeaponDefenseModifier_2
float GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DEFENSE_MODIFIER_2(Player playerId);Parameters:playerId: The player index.Returns: The value of player weapon defense modifier 2.A getter for _SET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DEFENSE_MODIFIER_2.
codeBlocks:
local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for GET_PLAYER_WEAPON_DEFENSE_MODIFIER_2
GetPlayerWeaponDefenseModifier2(player)
